uientry.s:
local this = UIComponent(Address) local parent = UIComponent(this:Parent())
local Faction = nil local Alliance = nil local Army = nil
function Initialise(f, a, ai) out.tom("Initialising", this:Id(), f, a, ai)
Faction = f Alliance = a Army = ai end
function OnSelect() parent:LuaCall("NotifyFactionSelected", Faction, Alliance, Army) end
